title: "We were right" - How to use o1-preview and o1-mini REASONING models
description:
ðŸ”¥ We were right... OpenAI just proved it. o1 is here... and i'll be honest... This model is NOT easy to use.

ðŸš€ In this video, we dive deep into OpenAI's latest o1 reasoning models, o1-preview and o1-mini, showing you exactly how to leverage them before everyone else! We've been championing prompt chaining and chain of thought techniques, and now OpenAI has embedded these patterns into their new o1 series. Join IndyDevDan as we explore how these reasoning models can revolutionize your AI projectsâ€”from AI coding to sentiment analysis on platforms like Hacker News.

ðŸ”¥ We'll walk through three practical examples demonstrating how to use these new reasoning models effectively. But be warnedâ€”the o1 models require a different approach to prompt engineering. We'll use tools from one of our favorite engineers, Simon Willison, to help you get the most out of these models.

ðŸ“ˆ See how our AI predictions have come true, and learn how to stay ahead in this rapidly evolving field.

ðŸ¤– Whether you're into AI prediction, AI coding, Prompt Engineering or just fascinated by the latest advancements from OpenAI, this video is packed with insights you won't want to miss!
